description: Try our easy to follow Chia, Oat & Apple Porridge With Berries recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Porridge,Pescatarian,Low saturated fat,Low salt,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Quick & easy breakfast,Egg free,Raspberry,High protein,High fibre,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Apple,Low fat,Peanut free
name: Chia, Oat & Apple Porridge With Berries Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 3 tbs chia seeds (save 1 tbs to sprinkle)

recipeInstructions.text: Combine oats, chia and milk or water in a small saucepan. Stir over medium-high heat until mixture comes to the boil. Reduce heat to low and simmer for 5 minutes or until tender.
Stir in the apple, vanilla and cinnamon. Remove from heat, cover and set aside for 2 minutes.
Spoon into serving bowls and top with a dollop of yoghurt, berries and extra chia seeds.
